extendedInfo.description: â â â 2013 OFFICIAL DSA preparation materials â â âFREE VERSION of PCV Theory Test UK Lite uses the Latest Official DSA revision question data bank in an intuitive, powerful way and is one of the most flexible applications on the market. REVISE MULTIPLE TOPICS at the same time! CHOOSE how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions! In this free version 4 full topics are included. IMPORTANT NOTICE: contains the Latest Official DSA revision question data bank complying with a new DSA regulations as of 23rd January 2012. The main features are: ********** â Regularly updated. 2013 ready! ********** ********** â Works offline. Get as much training as you need when you need it. ********** ********** â Realistic. Try your skills in the Mock Test as many times as you wish! ********** ********** â Advertisement free! ********** ********** â Flexible ********** - PCV Theory Test UK Lite intelligently takes into account which questions have been previously answered incorrectly! - Allows practice of any number of selected topics simultaneously - NO ANNOYING REPETITION: choose how many times you want to see the questions already answered in previous sessions - Choose the number of questions you want to answer during a practice test - Full statistics with the number of questions still to be answered on the front screen ********** â The Official DSA revision question database ********** In this free version 4 full topics are included. ********** â Easy to use ********** - Intuitive standardized interface allows you to focus on your test - Revise each question after test completion - Useful hints to make your learning more efficient

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: This app helped me pass my pcv theory first go, can\'t be bad.
reviews.author: Raymond Thomson

reviews.title: 4 star
reviews.comment: Would be 5 if it was free and full version but still a good app if your not paying for apps like this get a few different ones to get more questions otherwise good :)
reviews.author: Bradley Louis

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: It helps all the way through!
reviews.author: NGORAN KONAN

reviews.title: W
reviews.comment: Amazing app. .really helping me a lot.
reviews.author: Nabeel Latif

reviews.title: Awesome!!
reviews.comment: I have my Pcv theory test coming up soon and this app is making it soo easy for me to learn the modules.... Thank you for the help!
reviews.author: Umar Iqbal

reviews.title: Mr
reviews.comment: This is excellent app for anybody willing to do the test soon. U don\'t need to pay too plus u have the freedom to take it with u in your mobile or tablet.
reviews.author: Ali Siyad

reviews.title: L-plate
reviews.comment: Enjoyed playing this to keep my knowledge up, not enough variation though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great Help
reviews.comment: For those of us about to take test. This a great help
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GREAT
reviews.comment: This is must for any1 thinking of doing a PCV lic. Or any1 that already holds 1. I was a driving instructor and i downloaded it just too keep my hand in. Its very well put 2gether and has even the most experianced driver thinking again. Dont get complacent. Download it and keep your memory fresh. Even if you use it once a month as a driver or everyday as a learner.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Brilliant ap
reviews.comment: I hope this will help me pass my pcv. This ap is going to be great practice.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its nice but it is without htc kit......

reviews.comment: Very helpful if your wanting to be a bus driver
